We Have 25 Years Of Experience

Learn MoreAbout Us

Our fitness centre is one of the best in London and is equipped with the latest cutting edge equipment

A range of different massage echniques, reflexology, body scrubs and facial are available on-site which will help you unwind, relax and rejuvenate from the hustle and bustle of daily life.

Our Siam Thai Spa centre is run independently by a leading Thai wellness company ensuring uncompromising quality.

non-guests membership packages are available.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: http://vecurosoft.com/products/wordpress/mixlax.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

Relax Zone Our Services

Access to our fitness centre and pool is free to all our hotel guests. For
non-guests membership packages are available.

Beauty SPA Wellness

As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam

We Have 25 Years Of Experience

Learn MoreAbout Us

Our fitness centre is one of the best in London and is equipped with the latest cutting edge equipment

A range of different massage echniques, reflexology, body scrubs and facial are available on-site which will help you unwind, relax and rejuvenate from the hustle and bustle of daily life.

Our Siam Thai Spa centre is run independently by a leading Thai wellness company ensuring uncompromising quality.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
We Have 25 Years Of Experience

Learn MoreAbout Us

Our fitness centre is one of the best in London and is equipped with the latest cutting edge equipment

Rosalina D. Williamx

Founder & Beautician

Our Services

Facewash

90%

Hair Cut

70%

Spa Treatment

85%

Body Massage

95% Your -50% Offer is Right Here

Intro VideoExplore Studio

Our fitness centre is one of the best in London and is equipped with the latest cutting edge equipment

A range of different massage techniques, reflexology, body scrubs and facial are available on-site which will help you unwind, relax.

As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company ounded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave

YourBest Price Is Right Here

Check SomePrice Plans

Our fitness centre is one of the best in London and is equipped with the latest cutting edge equipment

A range of different massage techniques, reflexology, body scrubs and facial are available on-site which will help you unwind, relax.

As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company ounded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave

Meet WithOur Team

Access to our fitness centre and pool is free to all our hotel guests. For
non-guests membership packages are available.

item.title: Shoulder Massage
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods. As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences\u2014Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)\u2014allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. item.title: Massage & Relaxation
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

  • Relaxing tense muscles
  • Salt therapy
  • Aiding pain relief
  • Aiding pain relief
  • Egg therapy
  • Alleviating depression
  • Alleviating depression
  • Potato therapy
  • Beauty & Massage
  • Relaxing tense muscles
  • Misty salt therapy
  • Relaxing tense muscles

We Work For You

Our fitness centre is one of the best in London and is equipped with the latest cutting edge equipment.

  • Relax
  • Spa
  • Therapies

item.title: Caring & Sensuality
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

item.title: Manicure & Spa
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

  • Relaxing tense muscles
  • Salt therapy
  • Aiding pain relief

  • Egg therapy
  • Alleviating depression

  • Potato therapy
  • Beauty & Massage

  • Misty salt therapy

We Work For You

Our fitness centre is one of the best in London and is equipped with the latest cutting edge equipment.

item.title: Supreme Skin
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

item.title: Relaxing Massage
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods. As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods. As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods. item.title: Leaf Theraphy
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

item.title: Joana Smith
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods. As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods. item.title: Schoka
item.dc:creator: mixlax
item.content:encoded:
As part of a new partnership with Sensync, an immersive wellness company founded by Adam Gazzaley, Ph.D., and Alex Theory, Ph.D., The Vessel helps guests reset their brains with a host of customized journeys: Deep Space, Kairos, Ocean Cove, Zen Garden, Quantum Oneness, Crystal Cave, Lost Jungle, and Floating Clouds. Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods. Integrating aromatherapy, sound and music therapy, vibroacoustic stimulation, visual virtual reality, biofeedback and neurofeedback, meditation practices, and more, The Vessel helps spa-goers improve attention, reduce stress, and enhance their moods.

Designed to relax and restore the mind, the experiences—Relax ($75, 20 minutes), Restore ($75, 20 minutes), and Full Spectrum ($135, 40 minutes)—allow guests to take a virtual journey into nature. [text* firstName class:form-control placeholder "First name"]
[text* lastName class:form-control placeholder "Last name"]
[email* email class:form-control placeholder "Email address"]
[text* pnumber class:form-control placeholder "Phone number"]
[select subject class:form-control "Select Subject" "Spa and Beauty" "Skin Facial" "Sports Massage" "Hot Stone Massage" "Facial & Therophy"]
[textarea message placeholder "Type message"]
